footer.description: The success of a functional kitchen depends on the equipment used. When you have the right tools, the chef feels more confident and relaxed while preparing food.

about2.title: ABOUT US
about2.description1: The success of a functional kitchen depends on the equipment used.
about2.description2: When you have the right tools, the chef feels more confident and more relaxed while preparing food.
about2.note: The right equipment brings efficiency for the chef and satisfaction for the customer.

aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.heading: At Kulinare, we believe that the success of a kitchen doesn't start just with a good recipe
aboutUs.p1: It starts with the right equipment, efficient organization, and professional solutions that bring every culinary idea to life.
aboutUs.p2: Founded in 2006, Kulinare has built its reputation as one of the most trusted suppliers in the Kosovar market for professional kitchen equipment, utensils, accessories, and customized solutions for the hospitality and gastronomy industry.
aboutUs.p3: With extensive experience in the sector and a dedicated team of professionals, we are always close to our clients – from the first idea to the final installation of their kitchen.
aboutUs.p4: Chefs working with quality equipment feel more confident and relaxed in their work, while their customers appreciate this through the taste, comfort, and experience they provide.
aboutUs.p5: Since 2006, we have been the first choice for many businesses seeking quality, professionalism, and reliable partners. Whether you're starting your journey or looking to boost your business performance, Kulinare is your right partner.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower every gastronomy professional with high-quality equipment and reliable service, building sustainable standards for professional kitchens.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice in the market for every gastronomy professional seeking quality, expertise, and long-term partnership – positively impacting the development and modernization of the hospitality and food industry in Kosovo.

card3.title: Wide Range of Products
card3.description: With over 6,000 products for professional kitchens, we provide solutions for every need, taste, and preference.

card4.title: Team with Tradition and Professionalism
card4.description: Our many years of experience are reflected in our team – trained, dedicated, and always by your side with respect and care.

about.title: Who we are
about.lead: Since 2006, Kulinare has been a leading company in Kosovo specializing in professional equipment for kitchens, restaurants, hotels, and all Ho.Re.Ca. environments. With deep commitment to quality, the customer, and service, we provide modern and reliable solutions for food preparation, serving, storage, and transportation.

customer_focus.title: Customer dedication
customer_focus.body: Every decision and action of ours is guided by our customers' needs and expectations.

high_quality.title: High product quality
high_quality.body: We provide only equipment and solutions that meet the highest market standards.

sustainable_supply.title: Sustainable supply
sustainable_supply.body: We ensure continuity, reliability, and products that contribute to a long-term supply chain.

professional_service.title: Professional service
professional_service.body: From consultation to installation and service, our team always offers support with professionalism and integrity.

about.closing: We're not just a supplier — we're a strategic partner for gastronomy professionals seeking personalized, efficient solutions. With our experience and deep industry know-how, we deliver consulting and end-to-end projects for your spaces.
